page.title: 08SCHOOLS
page.content: Coningsby & Tattershall have {5 schools at the moment.{4}of them are primary and 1 is a secondary school. They all have B.B.C. Acorn computers. The{Gartree secondary school}has {423 pupils.{Curzon Primary }has {97}pupils {Coningsby Infants}&{Juniors}have{295 pupils altogether,{Clinton Park}has {131}pupils.{Gartree }& {Coningsby {Juniors }were built in{1954.Coningsby} {Infants }was built in the {19th}cen- tury.In September it will merge with Coningsby Juniors. {Curzon }was built in {1964. Clinton Park }was built in {1972}.The primary schools have{4-8}classes &{4-6}teachers. Gartree has{29}classes,takes{11-16 yr olds,has{23}teachers.The prim- ary schools take{5-11}yr olds and have {26-40}in a class.{Gartree}has{10-30}in a class{.Gartree}has{27}subjects & the primary have{4-9.
